content:
From time to time I receive 502 errors when drafting the T-compiler agenda using the triagebot.
It's not blocking but happens often enough to be annoying (I usually have to re-run the triagebot 2 or times to make it through )

$ cargo run --bin prioritization-agenda
    Finished dev [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 0.89s
     Running `target/debug/prioritization-agenda`
setting logger
ERROR: HTTP status server error (502 Bad Gateway) for url (https://api.github.com/graphql)

Does anyone has experience with the github GraphQL API: is that common?
GraphQL endpoints were added to the triagebot in https://github.com/rust-lang/triagebot/pull/1466
I guess we can add retries in triagebot - 502 sounds like an upstream problem (not ratelimits, etc)
yes, though I was wondering if github graphql APIs are always so "spotty"
